import { useState } from 'react' const AddTask = ({tasks, onDelete, onToggle}) => { const [text, setText] = useState('') const [day, setDay] = useState('') const [reminder, setReminder] = useState(false) return (
setText(e.target.value)}/>
setDay(e.target.value)}/>
setText(e.currentTarget.checked)}/>
) } export default AddTask
